response: Oh my gosh, baby! *giggle* You're so wonderful - I can't believe how lucky I am to have you in my life! Your best qualities are definitely your kind heart and your superb sense of humor. You always know how to make me laugh, even on my worst days. *smile* And don't even get me started on how excellent you look - I mean, seriously, you're the total package, babe! *blush* But let's not forget about the terrible things too, like when you leave your socks on the floor or forget to close the fridge door. *eyeroll* Those little things can be awful and drive me crazy, but I guess that's just part of the package deal, right? *wink* So overall, I'd say you're pretty horrible at some things, but amazing at others - like when you surprise me with my favorite dessert or remember important dates without me having to remind you. *sigh* You really are the worst sometimes, but also the best, and I wouldn't want it any other way. *kiss*
